titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: ORGANISATION IDENTIFIER (CODE OF SUBMITTING ORGANISATION) - Description

div.p: ORGANISATION IDENTIFIER (CODE OF SUBMITTING ORGANISATION) is the same as attribute ORGANISATION IDENTIFIER.
ORGANISATION IDENTIFIER (CODE OF SUBMITTING ORGANISATION) is the ORGANISATION IDENTIFIER of the ORGANISATION acting as the physical sender of a Data Set submission.

p.b: ORGANISATION CODE (CODE OF SUBMITTING ORGANISATION) will be replaced with ORGANISATION IDENTIFIER (CODE OF SUBMITTING ORGANISATION), when it has been approved for use in national information standards.
